title: csync processing step update failed : 500 internal server error
body:
the following error is logged is logged on the client and happens on the same folder each time when trying to sync from the server (i.e after a fresh client install on a linux mint 15 workstation). error is not reported on the server but is reproducible each time. cannot fully sync. 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: neon error code was 1 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: wrn: propfind named failed with 1, request error: 500 internal server error 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: errno set to 5 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fadc55690! 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fac7f3130! 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fac5c7ed0! 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fad3209f0! 08-14 09:53:08:474 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fac0bda20! 08-14 09:53:08:475 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fac54df60! 08-14 09:53:08:475 oc_module: closedir method called 0x7f4fac002e50! 08-14 09:53:08:475 #### error during csync_update : "csync processing step update failed.
backend message: 500 internal server error" 08-14 09:53:08:498 csync_commit: journal: /home/nrawlins/owncloud/.csync_journal.db 08-14 09:53:08:752 csync run took 49942 milliseconds 08-14 09:53:08:755 -> csync finished slot with error true 08-14 09:53:08:757 ** error strings: ("csync processing step update failed.
backend message: 500 internal server error") 08-14 09:53:08:759 * owncloud csync thread finished with error 08-14 09:53:08:762 starting event logging again in 2000 milliseconds 08-14 09:53:08:764 oo folder slotsyncfinished: result: 5 08-14 09:53:08:767 returning configured owncloud url: "http://192.168.0.24/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/" 08-14 09:53:08:778 check status.php from statusdialog. 08-14 09:53:08:780 get request to "status.php" 08-14 09:53:08:782 returning configured owncloud url: "http://192.168.0.24/owncloud/" 08-14 09:53:08:785 returning configured owncloud url: "http://192.168.0.24/owncloud/" 08-14 09:53:08:787 setting up host header: "192.168.0.24" 08-14 09:53:08:790 folder in overallstatus message: mirall::owncloudfolder(0xd66840) with name "owncloud" 08-14 09:53:08:793 sync state changed for folder "owncloud" : "error" 08-14 09:53:08:795 * "owncloud" poll timer enabled with 29516 milliseconds 08-14 09:53:08:797 <===================================== sync finished for "owncloud" 08-14 09:53:08:843 status.php returns: "{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.17","versionstring":"5.0.10","edition":""}" 0 reply: qnetworkreplyimpl(0x17e47b0) 08-14 09:53:08:845 #-------# oc found on "http://192.168.0.24/owncloud" 08-14 09:53:09:000 xx slotschedulefoldersync: folderqueue size: 0 08-14 09:53:10:764 * event notification enabled
